content.title: PRC: 79,212 examinees pass teacher’s licensure exam in Sept. 2018 - INQUIRER.net
79,000 pass September 2018 board exams for teachers - ABS CBN News
content.desc: ABS CBN News MANILA- A total of 79, 212 passed the licensure examination for teachers given last September, the Professional Regulation Commission (PRC) announced Friday. The PRC said 18,409 elementary teachers out of 90,750 examinees and 60,803 secondary teachers out of 126,582 examinees passed the exams. Of the elementary teachers who passed, 17,200 are first timers and 1,209 are repeaters. For the secondary teachers, 52,453 passers are first timers and 8,350 are repeaters. Rhea Joy Yebes Genson from the University of Southeastern Philippines- Davao City topped the licensure exams for elementary teach...
